Class DraggablePieceDecoder

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.view.gui.tiles.piece.DraggablePieceDecoder
public class DraggablePieceDecoder extends Object
Visitor class used to discertain what ServerMessage to generate due to a Drag and Drop event.
